name: Physical and cognitive measure and biosample-related information
Data and sample collection center-related information
Socio-demographic
definition: Basic demographic characteristics such as age, sex, and ethnicity

name: Socio-economic capital
definition: Indicators of education, income, occupation, and household affluence

name: Job history
definition: Information on participants’ occupations and workplaces over time

name: Parental occupation
definition: Maternal and paternal employment during pregnancy or early childhood

name: Toxic Habits - Tobacco, Alcohol, Drugs
definition: Information on tobacco, alcohol, and other substance use from questionnaires

name: Nutrition
definition: Dietary intakes measured by FFQ, 24h recall or any other collection tool

name: Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history
Puberty, menstruation, menopause and andropause
parent: Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history

name: Contraception
parent: Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history

name: Pregnancy, delivery and birth
parent: Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history
definition: Information on previous miscarriages, infertility, or pregnancy complications.

name: Fertility and sexual health
parent: Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history

name: Other reproductive health-related information
parent: Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history

name: Quality of life
parent: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations

parent: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations

name: Functional limitations
parent: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations

name: Use of assistive devices
parent: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations

name: Other perception of health, quality of life and functional limitation-related information
parent: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations

name: Parental diseases
definition: Parental history of chronic conditions such as obesity, diabetes, or asthma.

name: Symptoms and signs involving the circulatory and respiratory systems (R00-R09)
Symptoms and signs involving the digestive system and abdomen (R10-R19)
Symptoms and signs involving the skin and subcutaneous tissue (R20-R23)
Symptoms and signs involving nervous and musculoskeletal systems (R25-R29)
Symptoms and signs involving the urinary system (R30-R39)
Symptoms and signs involving cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour (R40-R46)
Symptoms and signs involving speech and voice (R47-R49)
Medication and supplements
definition: Medical drug use from questionnaire, record linkage or other

Visits to health professionals
parent: Health and community care services utilization

parent: Health and community care services utilization

name: Community and social care

parent: Health and community care services utilization

name: Other preschool, school or work life-related information
Geocodes for residential address
definition: Geographical coordinates of participants’ homes used to link with environmental data

name: Workplace characteristics
definition: Assessment of exposure to dust, solvents, metals, pesticides, or shift work

name: Food environment
definition: Availability of healthy or unhealthy food outlets near home or school

name: Natural environment
definition: Proximity and access to green, blue, or grey spaces surrounding the residence

name: Air pollution (indoor)
definition: Household exposure to pollutants from cooking, heating, or tobacco smoke.

name: Water DBPs
definition: Water desinfection by products (Trihalomethanes (THMs), haloacetic acids, chlorate, bromate)
